content.rendered: What would “4th of July, Asbury Park (Sandy)” be without Danny’s accordion? Or “Kitty’s Back” without his organ solo? Though his quiet demeanor reflected his nickname, “Phantom Dan,” Danny Federici certainly wasn’t a minor player in the E Street Band.

yoast_head_json.title: Danny Federici | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: What would “4th of July, Asbury Park (Sandy)” be without Danny’s accordion? Or “Kitty’s Back” without his organ solo? Though his quiet demeanor reflected his nickname, “Phantom Dan,” Danny Federici certainly wasn’t a minor player in the E Street Band.
yoast_head_json.og_description: What would “4th of July, Asbury Park (Sandy)” be without Danny’s accordion? Or “Kitty’s Back” without his organ solo? Though his quiet demeanor reflected his nickname, “Phantom Dan,” Danny Federici certainly wasn’t a minor player in the E Street Band.
